casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Asaiah Ben YISRAEL 304A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2017 Craig M. Cooley, Attorney at Law, Cary, for Yisrael, Asaiah Ben. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mary Louise Lucasse, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of November 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of November 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 13th day of December 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
